title: Lunatic or Lord? Interpreting the Man, the Moment, the Building, the Story
description:
Jesus clears the temple of money changers at the beginning of the Gospel of John. Why? 

Qanon Shaman Jailhouse Interview https://youtu.be/Xwdkng6ZGp8
